response.overview: After a crazy night partying at his parents' secluded winter home in Vermont, Teddy wakes up and unexpectedly meets Paul and Craig, two strangers who seem nice at first, but really possess a sinister hidden agenda. Despite Teddy's demands and violent threats, the two aggressive visitors refuse to leave, determined to complete their mysterious mission.
response.tagline: You ain't tasted the psycho... Yet
response.title: Hospitality
